body:
SciPy has a new minor release. It looks like they removed a lot of deprecated functions, so things aren't backwards compatible. We'll have to keep an eye out for any packages that don't build with the latest version of SciPy.

Successfully installs and passes all unit tests on macOS 10.15.2 with Clang 11.0.0 and Python 3.7.4.
title: Add py-scipy 1.4.0
